Oatey® Uni-Weld 8700 Series Purple Primer is a purple-tinted primer recommended for use with PVC and CPVC pipe and fittings. Purple Primer is formulated to remove dirt and oil from the surface of the piping, as well as soften the piping in preparation for solvent welding.
